The game features a variety of game modes, including a story mode, a free play mode, and a multiplayer mode. In story mode, players follow a linear narrative and complete objectives to progress through the game. Free play mode allows players to explore the game world at their own pace and engage in various activities. Multiplayer mode allows players to compete against each other in various game modes.

The game also features a variety of weapons, including firearms, melee weapons, and explosives. Each weapon has its own unique stats and can be customized with various attachments.

The game features a variety of environments, including cities, forests, deserts, and mountains. Each environment is unique and offers different challenges and opportunities. The game also features a dynamic weather system that affects gameplay. For example, rain can make roads slippery, while fog can reduce visibility.

The game features a variety of characters, including the player character, non-player characters (NPCs), and enemies. The player character is fully customizable and can be male or female. NPCs are non-playable characters that interact with the player and provide quests and information. Enemies are hostile characters that the player must defeat to progress through the game.
